    public abstract class DataSourceScalar
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataSource
    Particular data source for which the data is a simple scalar of type double.

      • getTag

        public DataTag getTag​()

        getTag in interface IDataSource
        Returns:
        a tag that uniquely identifies the IDataInfo

      • getDataAsScalar

        public abstract double getDataAsScalar​()
        Returns a single scalar value as the measurement for the given box. Subclasses define this method to specify the measurement they make.

      • getDataDouble

        public final DataDouble getDataDouble​()
        Causes the single getDataAsScalar(Box) value to be computed and returned for the given box. In response to a getData() call, MeterAbstract superclass will loop over all boxs previously specified via setBox and collect these values into a vector and return them in response to a getData() call.

      • getData

        public final IData getData​()
        Specified by:
        getData in interface IDataSource
        Returns:
        the data given by this source
